chunk:
Aika Wellness Rose Renewal Face Mask

Brand: Aika Wellness

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Mel (Honey), Rosa centifolia (Rose), Glycerin (Plant glycerin), Oriza Sativa (Rice), Catophylium inophyllum (Tamanu oil), Kaolin (French Argiletz Clay), Athlea officinalis (Marshmallow), Plant phospholipids (Lecithin), Argania Spinosa (Argan oil), Camellia olei

oil), Camellia oleifera (Camellia oil), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera), Hibiscus sabdariffa (Hibiscus), Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha), Pelargonium graveolens (Geranium), Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood), Santalum Spicatum (Sandalwood), Matricaria chamomilla (German Chamomile).

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restricti
ERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
